questions.question: Choose two words with a semantic relationship:

options.explanation: The relationship between a piano and a symphony is different from the relationship between a brush and a canvas.
The relationship between a piano and a symphony is different from the relationship between a hammer and a nail.
The relationship between a piano and a symphony is different from the relationship between a pen and ink.
Just as a piano is associated with a symphony, a guitar is associated with a song as a musical instrument.

questions.question: Choose two words with a semantic relationship:

options.explanation: The relationship between democracy and voting is different from the relationship between chemistry and elements.
The relationship between democracy and voting is different from the relationship between history and events.
The relationship between democracy and voting is different from the relationship between mathematics and equations.
Just as democracy involves voting, biology involves studying cells as a fundamental unit of life.

questions.question: Choose two words with a semantic relationship:

options.explanation: The relationship between a constellation and astronomy is different from the relationship between a sculpture and a painting.
The relationship between a constellation and astronomy is different from the relationship between poetry and literature.
The relationship between a constellation and astronomy is different from the relationship between theater and acting.
Just as constellations are studied in astronomy, architecture involves the application of engineering principles in designing structures.

questions.question: Choose two words with a semantic relationship:

options.explanation: The relationship between an algorithm and complexity is different from the relationship between medicine and disease.
The relationship between an algorithm and complexity is different from the relationship between language and grammar.
The relationship between an algorithm and complexity is different from the relationship between music and melody.
Just as algorithms can be complex, science involves conducting experiments to understand and explain natural phenomena.

questions.question: Choose two words with a semantic relationship:

options.explanation: The relationship between innovation and creativity is different from the relationship between adventure and risk.
The relationship between innovation and creativity is different from the relationship between success and failure.
The relationship between innovation and creativity is different from the relationship between wisdom and knowledge.
Just as innovation is associated with creativity, confidence is associated with the absence of doubt or uncertainty.

questions.question: Choose two words with a semantic relationship:

options.explanation: The semantic relationship between a film and a director is different from the relationship between a painting and an artist.
The semantic relationship between a film and a director is different from the relationship between a book and a writer.
The semantic relationship between a film and a director is different from the relationship between a sculpture and a sculptor.
Just as a film is associated with a director, a play is associated with a playwright as the creator of the dramatic work.

questions.question: Choose two words with a semantic relationship:

options.explanation: The semantic relationship between an ocean and waves is different from the relationship between a forest and trees.
The semantic relationship between an ocean and waves is different from the relationship between a mountain and snow.
The semantic relationship between an ocean and waves is different from the relationship between a desert and sand.
Just as an ocean is associated with waves, a lake is associated with ripples as the small wave-like movements on the surface.

questions.question: Choose two words with a semantic relationship:

options.explanation: The semantic relationship between politics and government is different from the relationship between economy and money.
The semantic relationship between politics and government is different from the relationship between education and school.
The semantic relationship between politics and government is different from the relationship between science and experiment.
Just as politics is associated with government, law is associated with justice as the system of rules and regulations for ensuring fairness.

questions.question: Choose two words with a semantic relationship:

options.explanation: The semantic relationship between a pen and writing is different from the relationship between a brush and painting.
The semantic relationship between a pen and writing is different from the relationship between a knife and cutting.
The semantic relationship between a pen and writing is different from the relationship between a spoon and stirring.
Just as a pen is used for writing, a keyboard is used for typing as an input device for computers.

questions.question: Choose two words with a semantic relationship:

options.explanation: The semantic relationship between rain and being wet is different from the relationship between the sun and being hot.
The semantic relationship between rain and being wet is different from the relationship between fire and burning.
The semantic relationship between rain and being wet is different from the relationship between ice and being cold.
Just as rain is associated with being wet, snow is associated with being white as frozen precipitation.

questions.question: Choose two words with a semantic relationship:

options.explanation: The semantic relationship between a doctor and a stethoscope is different from the relationship between a chef and an oven.
The semantic relationship between a doctor and a stethoscope is different from the relationship between a musician and a guitar.
The semantic relationship between a doctor and a stethoscope is different from the relationship between a teacher and a chalkboard.
